xml.name: Editor Coding Assistance
xml.Try: Press GotoNextError to go to the next highlighted error in the file.
Press ShowErrorDescription to see the error description.
Press ShowIntentionActions and select Add exception to method signature.
Press SurroundWith and select try/finally to surround it with selection.
Close the reader in the finally block by writing fileReader.close()
Press HighlightUsagesInFile to highlight all usages of the symbol at the caret within the file.
